title: Chandra Shekhar Ghosh likely to be Bandhan Group's executive head
description: Ghosh, who will retire from the bank on July 9 as managing director, will oversee Bandhan's insurance and mutual fund ventures, besides the bank's activity, two people familiar with the matter said.
